name: Crash Car Traffic Game
description:
Crash Car Traffic Game is experienced by everyone but there are very few fast car driving games in which realistic car crashes & car damage are shown. This game is equipped with master gameplay physics and high quality stunt racing accidents. Show virtual driving skills with the different level car crashing and enjoy realistic car damage of luxury cars.
Features:
- Realistic Game play with destructible vehicles
- Compelling Background music
- Drive with variety ofluxury vehicles
- Examine crashes in replay mode
- Destructible cars with hydraulic hand brake
